tit.cmt: 新規用語統一リストに従い、括弧内の補足を追加しました。

sen.j: 白餡（しろあん）とは、インゲンまたは小豆を茹でたものを潰して、砂糖または蜜で甘い味をつけた白色の漉し餡のこと。
sen.e: Shiroan, white strained sweet bean paste, is made from kidney beans or small beans boiled, crushed and sweetened with sugar or honey.
Shiroan, white strained sweet bean paste, is made from kidney beans or small beans boiled, crushed and sweetened with sugar or honey.
Shiroan, white strained sweet bean paste, is made from kidney beans or small beans boiled, crushed and sweetened with sugar or honey.

sen.j: お菓子の材料で、おもに饅頭や焼き菓子の中身などに使われる。
sen.e: It is one of the ingredients of Japanese confectionaries, mainly used for manju (buns with bean jam filling) and baked sweets.
It is one of the ingredients of Japanese confectionaries, mainly used for manju (buns with bean jam filling) and baked sweets.
